## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[createAutoEnvironmentAdapter()](./core.createautoenvironmentadapter.md)


</td><td>

Create an EnvironmentAdapter that auto-detects from the current environment. This is useful for Node.js environments where you want automatic detection without needing to create a full platform adapter.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[detectColorSupport()](./core.detectcolorsupport.md)


</td><td>

Detect color support from environment variables. Works in Node.js by accessing globalThis.process.env without Node-specific imports. Returns no color support in non-Node environments (browser should provide its own detection).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[detectTerminalBackground()](./core.detectterminalbackground.md)


</td><td>

Detect terminal background from environment variables. Works in Node.js by accessing globalThis.process.env without Node-specific imports.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
